About Me

BIO

Throughout my time as a software engineer, my goal has always been to deliver fully-functional and visually compelling products, that remain easy to use and understand. My career has given me the opportunity to reach this goal through a number of languages, technologies, and frameworks, and I continue to learn new ways to convey my passion.

Relevant Experience

Grow Technologies Inc.

Junior Software Engineer (Co-op)

• Daily duties ranged from bug-fixes, to minor, and major, feature implementation.
• Workflow followed a two week sprint, with daily stand-ups over Slack, and progress updating on Jira
• Work involved communication with all parts of Grow's team, including backend, QA, and product design
• Technologies Used Daily:
• React, React Redux, node, Yarn
• Git, GitLab, GitHub
• Visual Studio Code, Postman, SourceTree, OSX Terminal, Slack

BlueShore Financial

Developer Co-op

• Worked on a variety of tools intended to improve the efficiency of the team/department/company, including tools to easier process data outputs, a tool to better visualize tax workflows, and a tool to provide accurate, but anonymous, data for logistical purposes.
• Worked with C#, HTML/CSS, JS (Vanilla, Knockback), ASP.NET, Unity.

Elastic Path Software

Student Software Developer

• Worked with Elastic Path as part of BCIT's Industry Learning Project courses (COMP 3900/4900)
• Main duties included acting in a project manager role, spearheading documentation and organization. Major member of the development and implementation of a guided tutorial for an Elastic Path in-house application.
